hibernate-mapping.query: select medicalFacility from omis.health.domain.MedicalFacility medicalFacility where medicalFacility.location = :location
select medicalFacility from omis.health.domain.MedicalFacility medicalFacility inner join fetch medicalFacility.location where medicalFacility.active = true order by medicalFacility.name

select medicalFacility from omis.health.domain.MedicalFacility medicalFacility inner join fetch medicalFacility.location location where medicalFacility.active = true and location.organization = :organization order by medicalFacility.name

select medicalFacility from omis.health.domain.MedicalFacility medicalFacility inner join fetch medicalFacility.location where medicalFacility.active = true and medicalFacility.hospital = true order by medicalFacility.name

select medicalFacility from omis.health.domain.MedicalFacility medicalFacility inner join fetch medicalFacility.location location inner join fetch location.organization organization where medicalFacility.active = true and medicalFacility.hospital = true and organization = :organization order by medicalFacility.name
